title: My Pixel 4a not charging it seems like the port is broken
content:
My pixel 4a will not charge all the time it seems like it is the charging port in my phone. I have tried multiple cords. You have to play with it to get it to work sometimes. 

I cannot find a phone no. or get a hold of anyone at the google store for repair or fix. The phone no. i find will not let you talk to anyone.

Please help!
